SELECT * from ( SELECT i.id, i.name, i.manager, date_format(i.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS create_time,
CASE WHEN i.status=1 and (i.`day`='max' or i.`day` >= DATEDIFF(NOW(),i.run_time)) THEN 2 WHEN i.status=2 THEN 3 WHEN i.status=1 and i.`day`!='max' and i.`day`< DATEDIFF(NOW(),i.run_time) THEN 4 WHEN i.status=1 and CURRENT_TIMESTAMP < i.run_time THEN 1 ELSE 0 END As status, gm.name AS game_name, ( SELECT count( 1 ) FROM inno72_interact_machine WHERE interact_id = i.id ) AS merchant_num, ig.goods_num AS goods_num, IF(0>DATEDIFF(NOW(),i.run_time),0,DATEDIFF(NOW(),i.run_time)) AS real_day, i.day AS day, ( SELECT count( 1 ) FROM inno72_order r WHERE r.inno72_activity_id = i.id and goods_type=1) AS real_num, ig.number AS number, ( SELECT count( 1 ) FROM inno72_order r WHERE r.inno72_activity_id = i.id and goods_type=1)/ig.number AS goodsSend FROM inno72_interact i LEFT JOIN inno72_game gm ON gm.id = i.game_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT m.interact_id,sum(mg.number) AS number,COUNT(DISTINCT mg.goods_id) AS goods_num,GROUP_CONCAT(m.machine_code) AS machine_code FROM inno72_interact_machine m LEFT JOIN inno72_interact_machine_goods mg ON m.id=mg.interact_machine_id and mg.type=0 GROUP BY m.interact_id ) ig on ig.interact_id =i.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ig.interact_id,GROUP_CONCAT( g.`name` ) AS goods_name,GROUP_CONCAT( g.`code` ) AS goods_code FROM inno72_interact_goods ig LEFT JOIN inno72_goods g ON g.id = ig.goods_id AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY ig.interact_id ) g on g.interact_id=i.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT im.interact_id,GROUP_CONCAT( CONCAT(l.mall,l.`name`) ) AS locale,GROUP_CONCAT( CONCAT(area.province,area.city,area.district) ) AS area FROM inno72_interact_machine im LEFT JOIN inno72_interact_machine_time mt ON im.id = mt.interact_machine_id LEFT JOIN inno72_machine m ON m.id = im.machine_id LEFT JOIN inno72_locale l ON l.id = m.locale_id LEFT JOIN inno72_admin_area area ON area.`code` = l.area_code GROUP BY im.interact_id ) area on area.interact_id=i.id
where i.is_delete = 0
and ( i.name LIKE '%${keyword}%' or gm.name LIKE '%${keyword}%' or i.manager LIKE '%${keyword}%' or ig.machine_code LIKE '%${keyword}%' or g.goods_name LIKE '%${keyword}%' or g.goods_code LIKE '%${keyword}%' or area.locale LIKE '%${keyword}%' or area.area LIKE '%${keyword}%' )
and i.status=0 and i.status=1 and CURRENT_TIMESTAMP < i.run_time and i.status=1 and (i.`day`='max' or i.`day` >= DATEDIFF(NOW(),i.run_time)) and i.status=2 and i.status=1 and i.`day`!='max' and i.`day`< DATEDIFF(NOW(),i.run_time) ) t
ORDER BY ${orderBy}
SELECT i.*,gm.name AS game_name FROM inno72_interact i LEFT JOIN inno72_game gm ON gm.id = i.game_id where i.id = #{id}
